races.name: Cadel Evans Great Ocean Road Race
UAE Tour
races.description: 2.UWT cycling race in United Arab Emirates

races.name: Vuelta a Andalucia - Ruta del Sol
Princess Maha Chakri Sirindhorn's Cup Tour of Thailand
Région Pays de La Loire Tour
Région Pays de la Loire Tour Féminin
GP Beiras e Serra da Estrela

stages.name: Stage 1: Barcelona → Barcelona
stages.description: Team time trial with two climbs of Montjuïc; technical city-center course

stages.name: Stage 2: Tarragona → Barcelona
stages.description: Repeated short climb to Montjuïc Castle (1.6 km at up to 13%), punchy circuit-style finish

stages.name: Stage 3: Granollers → Les Angles
stages.description: First summit finish at high Pyrenean ski station Les Angles

stages.name: Stage 4: Carcassonne → Foix
stages.description: Hilly transition stage through the Pyrenean foothills

stages.name: Stage 5: Lannemezan → Pau
stages.description: Flat sprinters' stage

stages.name: Stage 6: Pau → Gavarnie-Gèdre
stages.description: Classic Pyrenean giants: Col d'Aspin and Col du Tourmalet before summit finish at Gavarnie-Gèdre

stages.name: Stage 7: Hagetmau → Bordeaux
stages.description: Flat sprinters' stage through the Landes forest

stages.name: Stage 8: Périgueux → Bergerac
stages.description: Flat sprinters' stage in the Dordogne

stages.name: Stage 9: Malemort → Ussel
stages.description: Hilly breakaway terrain in the Corrèze

stages.name: Rest Day 1: Cantal
stages.description: First rest day in the Cantal region

stages.name: Stage 10: Aurillac → Le Lioran
stages.description: Bastille Day mountain stage in the Massif Central with summit finish at Le Lioran

stages.name: Stage 11: Vichy → Nevers
stages.description: Flat transition stage

stages.name: Stage 12: Magny-Cours → Chalon-sur-Saône
stages.description: Flat stage starting from the Magny-Cours racing circuit

stages.name: Stage 13: Dole → Belfort
stages.description: Long hilly stage through the Jura foothills

stages.name: Stage 14: Mulhouse → Le Markstein
stages.description: Vosges mountain stage: Grand Ballon, Col du Page, Ballon d'Alsace, Col du Haag

stages.name: Stage 15: Champagnole → Plateau de Solaison
stages.description: Very steep summit finish at Plateau de Solaison; includes Le Salève at ~11% avg over 4.7 km

stages.name: Rest Day 2: Haute-Savoie
stages.description: Second rest day before the Alpine finale

stages.name: Stage 16: Évian-les-Bains → Thonon-les-Bains
stages.description: Individual time trial along Lake Geneva

stages.name: Stage 17: Chambéry → Voiron
stages.description: Flat transition stage before the Alpine finale

stages.name: Stage 18: Voiron → Orcières-Merlette
stages.description: Mountain stage with summit finish at the ski station Orcières-Merlette

stages.name: Stage 19: Gap → Alpe d'Huez
stages.description: Short but brutal mountain stage finishing atop the legendary Alpe d'Huez

stages.name: Stage 20: Le Bourg-d'Oisans → Alpe d'Huez
stages.description: Queen stage: Col de la Croix de Fer, Col du Télégraphe, Col du Galibier (roof of the Tour), Col de Sarenne, Alpe d'Huez. ~5,600m elevation gain

stages.name: Stage 21: Thoiry → Paris
stages.description: Ceremonial finale with multiple ascents of Rue Lepic/Montmartre before Champs-Élysées sprint

races.name: Giro della Toscana - Memorial Alfredo Martini
A Travers Les Hauts de France
GP de Fourmies - La Voix du Nord
Sun Hung Kai Hong Kong Cyclothon
